title: Alcatel A3 10 (VOLTE) 2 GB RAM 16 GB ROM 10.1 inch with Wi-Fi+4G Tablet (White, Blue)

product_specification.Sales Package: Tablet, Battery, AC Power Adapter, USB Cable, User Manual, Warranty Card
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Tablet, 6 Months on Accessories

product_description.Immersive Sound: Can't go a day without listening to music or watching videos? Then this tablet is what you need. The Alcatel A3 10 is the perfect entertainment companion as it comes with dual speakers which offer an outstanding sound wave effect while the Arkamys system provides an immersive sound.
product_description.Beautiful Design: Its 3D texturized back cover adds a touch of elegance to the Alcatel A3 10 while its slim 8.95 mm design feels great in your hands.
product_description.Brilliant Performance: There's more to this tablet than just good looks and sleek design. The Alcatel A3 10 is powered by a 1.1 GHz quad-core processor and 2 GB of RAM, which means you can multitask easily and switch between apps without facing lag. What's more, this tablet also offers blazing-fast 4G connectivity and a glitch-free streaming experience.
product_description.Split Screen for Easy Multitasking: Do you hate it when you have to pause your game just to reply to a text message? Well, with the Alcatel A3 10, you don't have to as it comes with a split screen feature. This Alcatel tablet runs on the Android Nougat OS which offers easy user experience.
product_description.Stunning Display: The 25.4 cm IPS display of this tablet makes way for an immersive video experience. Watch movies on the go and catch up on your favourite TV shows in an excellent clarity. That's not all, this tablet also comes with 16 GB internal storage which can further be expanded by up to 128 GB.
product_description.Battery: Thanks to this 4600 mAh Lithium Polymer battery, you can go all-day long listening to music and watching movies without worrying about running out of charge.
product_description.Camera: Equipped with a 5 MP rear camera and a 2 MP front camera, this tablet allows you to capture everyday moments and video call your loved ones.

review:
I am using this product since 4 days now. I could say that I am completely satisfied with the performance and overal features of this product.

Pros
- Nice and loud sound.
- The Contrast ratio of the display is superb.
- Battery Backup is ultimate even though it has 4600 mAh.
- Good Response
- No Lag experienced so far.

Cons
- Non FHD.
- No HDMI Port

Finally, I would recommend others to buy this product.

Hi friends! This is an average tablet. I did a detailed review in my youtube channel TechKnowLogical. You can find out there.

As per my experience I can tell you that it's suitable for students, who need tablet for study purpose only. For media consumption also, it's fairly well. But forget about heavy gaming or high end app such as video editing etc. The major problem I found is that it's touch is not very responsive and of course it's SoC is not that great so can't expect great performance on gaming front.

Battery backup is quite good though, if I turn on the airplane mode then I can enjoy 8-9 hrs of non stop movie. I guess you can judge it's battery performance. And one more thing, it's not VoLTE, I don't know why it's featured as VoLTE tablet.

I got this tablet in 7300/- so I can't complain. In that price it's quite good tablet, but otherwise it's very mediocre tablet. Hope this help.. peace

READ THIS REVIEW TO DECIDE WHETHER BUY THIS PRODUCT OR NOT!
Alcatel A3 10 is a 10.1 inch tablet with Mediatek processor clocked 1.1 ghz which is quite low for tablets these days.
Processor :
From my usage experience, this product is very sluggish even though it is running near stock android. This may turn off some users who want to do quick multitasking on this device. I opened 5-7 tabs of various apps and the the tab almost slowed down to halt. I would not definitely recommend this for gaming and multitasking. I fear if what the performance will be in an year from now.
3/10

Display:
The display is 720p and is very average by far. It looks uncrisp and quite blurry looking at it close by. That's not to say that is unusable but if you are thinking of something close to likes of MI Pad or Apple iPad, you'll be disappointed. Though it expected at this price and display size. I might say that this size is great experience for me in reading ebooks.

Next I tried using it for watching downloaded TV shows. Had watched stranger things season 2 at 720p, no issues faced but keep in mind not to try watching anything more than 720p, the display does not scale down and you'll face lots of hangups and grey screens.
5/10

Camera:
GARBAGE. You'll take better photos with a potato attached with wiring. Don't buy if you are thinking of using it to take wedding pics or vacation pictures.
1/10

Sound:
In this aspect it has no competition, the sound is better than high end tablets and laptops. The sole one and only reason I would recommend this product for. The sound from the two front speakers are loud and clear. I keep the volume at 20% and it is loud enough to watch videos enjoyably. Best for those who dislike using headphones. Buy this if you're a ardent music listener.
10/10

Battery:
Lasts long enough for the day thanks to its underclocked processor. Would update in future in an year to see how it is.
8/10

Connectivity :
4G and VoLTE enabled tablet, works well with Jio and Airtel 4G networks on which I've tested.
8/10

The system ships with usual bloatware like flipkart app, app store by Alcatel and Google trash like play movies, play music etc which cannot be Uninstaller.
Other apps included are facebook, messenger, Instagram, wps office which can be uninstalled.

Other than above aspects, I would recommend buying it if you want simple media playback, web surfing and for reading ebooks. You can do light gaming as well.

NOT RECOMMENDED IF YOU ARE A POWER USER AND WANT TO USE CUSTOM ROMS, MEDIATEK DEVICES HAVE NO ACTIVE DEVELOPER COMMUNITY.

Ordered it on day 1.. with a 35% off, got it for 6.4K. Performance is good.

Pros -
HD display with 10 inch, very good for watching movies.
Dual speaker are very good.
got headset along with the device which is also good.
Battery is good.
OK RAM of 2 GB atleast 1 GB is free most of the time to use more apps.
split screen option is great, you can do multi tasking.
Dual SIM is good.
Device is good for both Official and personal usage, like mailing, browsing, kids education etc. Didn't try games, not interested.
Touch is OK.

Cons -
looks very cheap due to plastic build. Already the sim card slot lid is loose.
Got a screen guard along with the device. it is of low quality. Glass one would have been great.
16 GB ROM is very less, would have been good if it was 32 GB at least.
I feel the WIFI is a bit slow with the device.
Device Hangs for a sec and comes back. Happened twice already. But doesn't seem to be a great problem.
No VoLTE support.


bottom line, for a 6.4K its a very good buy. Go for it..

Best for exam preparation. Do not expect too much quality. This is worth what we pay for. For a mediatek processor performance is so smooth. Received update for VoLTE on 27/09/2017. After receiving update go to settings > wireless settings > more > mobile networks> enable enhanced LTE . screen viewing angles are very good. Audio quality and output is best part of this tablet. Battery backup lasts for one n half day. Instead of Kindle readers and over priced Lenovo tabs which are not more than 8 inches , Alcatel A3 10 is the only best choice left. Thanks to Alcatel.
it's really fantastic I really love that such a big screen such a good working condition such a nice deal actually...was totally satisfied with the tab loved surely should go with it

Speed, sound and convenience to handle are plus points. Display is the only downside I noticed so far. Basically it is a 10 inch, big display. But the screen resolution is only 1280x800. Not really enough to give good hinting and anti-aliasing for the screen fonts. And most of the applications are not built for the screen size. For example, when you open the settings application, there is a lot of space left on both sides. Same with the pull down notification and quick access menu. It is really small and doesn't fill the screen at all.

When playing full screen video, however, bigger display is very useful. Sound is really nice and speakers are on the front. I can keep it on the bed and still hear the sound. Very light weight for the size. Plastic feels fragile. Screen guard is included in the package. If your regular use is playing videos, surfing and reading, it is really worth the price.
Brilliant Product, Excellent & Fast touch Quality, Big Display, Sufficient Spaces, Camera Quality is good Overall Product is very good.

It's been an month that I'm using and tab performance is very good so for. It's very useful for reading books and watching videos. First you feel it's big but when you get use to it you will definitely love it's performance. I barley opens my laptop after getting tab. Game performance is also very nice.

I am using this product since 4 days now. I could say that I am completely satisfied with the performance and overal features of this product.

Pros
- Nice and loud sound.
- The Contrast ratio of the display is superb.
- Battery Backup is ultimate even though it has 4600 mAh.
- Good Response
- No Lag experienced so far.

Cons
- Non FHD.
- No HDMI Port

Finally, I would recommend others to buy this product.

Well writing review from the same product I'm writing for, seriously believe me guys it is worth for every single penny, awesome purchase and also quite fast delivery FLIPKART, but really disappointed with the issue I faced with payment... Other than that it is a nice deal, screen is really good despite of low res,
Just got in my hands today, so it was just an initial impression, will update later with much details...




Update after 2 weeks if uses...
First of all I'm very happy and satisfied with this tab,
It has best smart phone or tab battery I've ever seen...
I almost get 7-8 hrs of screen on time. No need to charge 2nd time in a single day even after heavy uses.
Outdoor visibility of screen is tremendous, I keep its brightness at 50-60% even in direct sunlight.
Super speaker output, dual stereo speakers performs better than expectation.
Calling is good, Jio sim using Jio4Gvoice app(no volte)


Now there are some cons... which are really not big issues...(atleast for me)

No physical LED notification
No vibrator (yes, no vibrator, probably the reason of good battery)
Average cameras (both)
OkOk touch response
RAM management is just OK...

Overall you can see. .. cons are nothing in front of pros for a tablet at this price.. this tab is perfect for Reading books, news papers(Jio news app), magazines(Jiomag app), video watching, and (I don't play games but you can)..?



Important Update....27-09-017

Got volte update yesterday...now Jio voLTE is supported by this tablet...

I love the product .help me to study a lot in eassy way .i think this best tab love it..love it. Used for mostly students

I got this product for INR 7199 during BBD.

Pros:
1. This tablet is insanely big for this price. I am kidding not. 10 inch screen makes a whole lot of difference.
2. Very nice interface and does not lag during normal usage. No heating so far.
3. Supports HD display, so HD videos play like charm on this tablet.
4. There is a screenguard sent along, so that avoids you hunting for a suitable one.

Cons:
1. Very thin line of rainbow pixels have started to appear on the bottom of the screen. This perhaps might have happened during screenguard installation.
2. Camera quality is really poor I must admit. But that's not my primary purpose of using this tablet, hence does not matter much.

Overall I'd say it's more than worth at 7k. If you are looking for a tablet in the 10k ish range, go for this. I personally did a lot of research before buying this and I found this to be the best in this price segment. Even if it was for 10k, I would have probably gone ahead and purchased this one.

Cheers.

I am delighted with this tablet and recommend it as being a reliable and safe choice for anyone who is looking for a ten inch tablet. The tablet is very light in weight, smart to look at, has a non-skid-easy-to-grip back cover and does not get heated, making it easy to hold for hours. The battery seems to last forever, even with several hours of video viewing and internet usage: I don't even have to charge it every day. The quality of the screen resolution is very good, the sound surprising very loud and not tinny in quality. The wifi streams seamlessly and I have not had any issues so far in the two weeks I have used it. Flipkart added to the delight when this was delivered in 24 hours at no extra cost. Highly recommend it for anyone who is looking for a large size tablet, that is no fuss and easy to use. Been using it for six months
and have had no problems at all.

Excellent product .... Very nice. I got it just only at price 7199₹ on big million day. Highly recommended for study purpose and movies watching having very good speakers and above avg hd quality. Just go for it.

Sound is great. 4g Volte rocks. Processor is slightly lagging but still ok. Don't bother about Camera quality.

Worst thing is low quality display for such huge screen. Not at all good for reading and even hd movie watching sucks. While reading, it seems highly pixelated and really tiresome. If ur purpose is reading, avoid those 5 star ratings and pls don't choose it.

Finally I have been a trusted customer of Flipkart since long. But this time one star less for Flipkart policy of non-returning the products, especially things like Alcatel that u have never had hand on before.

Conclusion:- Readers never ever buy this product. Flipkart should restore Return policy instead of just Replacement otherwise many customers like me have already started thinking of other options. Thanks.
Product is nice it's too slim handy, front camera is not that much good overall it's ok , but if accessories are available in Flipkart means it's better to buy ( screen guard,case or cover etc...)

I purchased this tablet from Flipkart in the 2nd week of August, 2017. My experience in using the tablet has been great.
Display - The screen, though not Full HD, is bright and clear. It is adequate for my photography needs for viewing and displaying my images. Though, I would have loved had it been Full HD.
Sound - The speakers on the tablet are fabulous. Loud and clear. Watching movies or playing rhymes for my children is a very pleasant experience.
Touch - The touch on the tablet is very smooth and precise. A friend of mine who has a Samsung tablet found the touch to be similar.
Battery - Though my usage of the tablet is intense only during weekends, a full charge works easily for me for throughout the day. With minimal usage, I think I could get it to run for 3 days without a charge.
Features - I am happy that I have the latest Android. The software provided pre-loaded are not bloated. I have kept my software installations to a minimum. I haven't seen any lag or slowness in the tablet. Though I would have preferred a higher amount of RAM.

Writing this review after my kids have been playing with this for over 14 days now.

I have always been a fan of Stereo sound in tablets, I had chinese M3 Movie and chinese Tbook 10 earlier. Pipo lasted over 4 years while Teclast conked off in 4 months (bad memory - bricked). This is the only tablet I found that had stereo speakers placed nicely on the edges to provide widest separation. When I heard the tablet first time it was really the best I have heard compared to my previous tablets. In fact, at night it is too loud even at minimum (just above 0) .. so have to reduce it to 0 at times. But really sound is great while playing games and listening to music in Google Play (you should disable equalizer in Google Play music to get higher loudness). However, while watching movies the volume was not adequate. which could be due to the content itself.

For the price, this is great, build quality is good, battery lasts quite well, 2 GB RAM and 16 GB storage is very adequate. Screen resolution is acceptable though full HD would have been really great. Screen brightness is also good, I just keep it a notch above minimum to minimize battery drain.

Camera is below average (I dont care about it anyway on 10 inch tab). If you want to scan docs using this (or any other mobile) keep the tablet/mobile on a table with camera protruding out of the edge of table and keep the document under the camera on a chair etc. with right height, have good light falling on the document, and then touch the click button lightly (you can even put a 2 sec timer) ..this will ensure there is no camera shake and you will obtain much better results even with this not so great camera.

On the software side, it has latest Android Nougat which has the cool feature of running two apps side by side. It comes with Alcatel launcher so there few undesirable apps that cannot be disabled. There is some lag while scrolling etc. sometimes but not too annoying. Most games can be played. My son plays Minecraft, Angry Birds Rio etc, Modern Combat.. little lag is there in Real Racing 3. Real Steel works fine. You can also have multiple accounts / guest account configured in Android as in previous tablet versions of Android. You can add shortcuts in the Navigation Bar (where Home,Back,Apps buttons are there typically).

The tablet also supports 2G / 3G / LTE network for voice calling and data and takes in a Micro Sim. For voice I tried Jio sim few days back but could not find VoLTE feature anywhere at that time. I was able to make calls with Jio using the Jio app. Now, today I got a system update and after that an option for Enhance LTE for voice and other communication is added in Mobile Networks section, which I think will enable native calling from Jio sim. However, I could not test it. Today I tested network speed with Airtel Sim and good signal but results were not great..~1Mbps download and ~2.5Mbps upload, in fact speed in 3G was better than 4G. Cant say anything conclusively as network condition can vary greatly.

Tried 2G calls as well and worked fine.. note that the tablet always remains in speakerphone mode while in calls, you cannot turn off speaker phone.

For WiFi, tablet supports 2.4G networks only, no support for 5G.

Overall I think it's a great product at sweet price.

Got it for a real good price. let's straight get into pros and cons.

cons:
1. performance is below par. hangs if 3-4 apps runs in the background. frezzes frames sometimes. YouTube hangs in 720p. entire UI feels sluggish.
2. battery is not so good. around 3.5 hours of screen on time. not used with a sim. only using with WiFi. also usage of speakers drains lot of battery. changing mode to battery saver saves battery a bit, so try that settings.
3. built quality is avarage. makes squarky sound when picked up. It may not last if my daughter sits in it!!!!!
4. Volume button and power button is easily pressed if the tab is kept vertically. buttons are not textured, which makes it difficult to find.
5. Camera, as known, does not serve any purpose. the front cam in video calling is almost unusable.
6. could not find any way to cast screen to smart tv or any other device.
7. charging is super slow. even with 10 watt charger takes 4 hours to charge. also if you use it while charging, the battery percentage drops.
8. Updates - have security updated till aug. 2017. no one should expect software or security update here.
9. would have loved physical orientation switch, HDMI port and face unlock. pin unlock is painful. u need to enter pin and click OK everytime.
10. you can't get proper accessories for this tab. no proper back cover available. only generic cases!!!
Pros.
1. sound : the volume is awesome. you can literary feel the stereo effect. it's better than any tab or laptop i used. clean and clear.
2. display : display is colourful. has good viewing angles. gets too much bright at night even with minimum brightness though. but good for the one thing it's made for, media consumption. it's big and vibrant.
3. OS : Naugat out of the box makes it run almost all latest software. it's almost stock, so have nice toggles in drop down menu, like choice of Bluetooth device comes in the drop-down menu itself when clicked on Bluetooth toggle. Maping navigation bar and adding shortcuts there is a nice touch.
4. value for money : Got it for 6k. No other 10 inch tablet comes at that price. 100 percent value for money.

conclusion : best for media consumption under 9k. easy to hold light tab. i can recommend this. don't use for other heavy work. 720p is underwhelming, but brightness and colour makes it up at this price.

The tab is a work of ingenuity. I had this tab for over a month. Answers to FAQs are below in form of pros and cons.

Pros:-
1. Affordable 10.1" tablet
2. A very crisp and sharp display
3. Clear sound
4. Slim design, easy to hold, easy to operate
5. 4g volte works fine
6. The processor even though not that of a premium tablet, churns out enough performance.
7. Responsive
8. Standby time is impressive
9. Stock android (P.S i installed Google now launcher and now it's a totally authentic Google Android tablet)

Cons:-
1. Doesn't support 720p display and will start lagging.
2. You may feel the audio starts to crackle at high volume.
3. No extra port for USB and pendrives.
4. Front camera is not alligned very well and you may have to adjust it to take a selfie.
5. Universal cover available but no model specific cover which is a let down.
6. Plastic finish may turn off some buyers

Verdict:-
This tablet may not be at par with the other tablets but ranks very close. However, don't confuse it as a high performance tablet for gaming and all those activities. It's a perfect hand-held device for watching movies, reading ebooks and research papers and with volte+4g connectivity, the device would keep you satisfied.

Seen many of the negative review that its hangs alot, battery drainage, heat issue etc.

But personally I didn't face any such types of problems & at offer price of 7199₹ according to me its best grabing deal.

You can't find such type of specifications at such a lower price in other brands.

My suggestions for negative review user would be-
1) Switch off tab when you are not using, no battery drainage at all.
2) Keep applications in limit, dont install all the apps recommended by Alcatel on first start.
3) Its having 2GB ram so usage of apps should be according to that only, so it would avoid hanging.

Hope you would have like my suggestion.

Bought Rs. 8000 Diwali Festival Offer. Value for money. No problem in software or hardware. Built quality is good. Charging data cable does not fully insert in USB slot and bit loose so not advisable to use tab while charging. Takes 4 hours 30 minutes to fully charge when battery is at 5 percent level. Slow charging due to 5v 1amp charger. Screen resolution 720p good for video. Install MX Player (J2 interactive) because it's take advantage of tabs hardware acceleration. JIO VoLTE supported if u install 115mb software when u click software update app. In Settings WiFi off and mobile data ON to update it. Takes 10 minutes to restart tab after update so be patient. Lastly this is my second tab. I have Samsung Galaxy Tab3 SM-T311 8 inch HD 3G calling tab bought 2014 rs.24000 from Flipkart. Cannot compare Samsung with Alcatel.

It seems everything about this tablet is cost cutting . The Tablet feels cheap, particularly its back cover & the side cover for SIM & memory card. The quality of accessories given i.e charger & head phone felt to be very ordinary. The seller has given screen guard with the tablet which is a plastic sheet cover !!! Thus attracting scratches and marks on the screen very easily.. In a panic mode I ordered Screen Guard from a different website at a high cost.

There are no covers or OTG cable given along with this Tablet.. Cost Cutting ? The quality of camera is below average with no flash. The screen seemed very sluggish and sometimes ti refuses to respond to one's touch... I was thinking of returning the tablet, but the tab has improved in its response, and it seems to be okay now... However, don't expect response speed of a mobile from this tablet.

On a positive note, I got this tab for Rs.7,199/- on Billion day Sale, so it seems okay with this price as it is a 4G tab albeit only with a single SIM . Sound is also loud and okay...
